sentences.english: This event had at last been despaired of, but it was then too late to be saving.
sentences.chinese: 这个指望落了空，如今省吃俭用已经太迟了。

sentences.english: They stinted for years to buy their own house.
sentences.chinese: 他们省吃俭用有多年了，以便能节省下钱买房子。

sentences.english: Every day, families sacrifice to live within their means.
sentences.chinese: 每一天，无数家庭通过省吃俭用以维系生活。

sentences.english: If you are a live frugally type, 1000 is almost enough.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一个省吃俭用型的，1000也差不多够了。

sentences.english: I have scrimped and saved to give you a good education.
sentences.chinese: 我省吃俭用让你接受良好教育。

sentences.english: They scrimped and saved to give the children a good education.
sentences.chinese: 他们省吃俭用，为的是攒钱让孩子受到良好的教育。

sentences.english: They live frugally to accumulate more funds for the state.
sentences.chinese: 他们省吃俭用，为的是为国家积累资金。

sentences.english: B. They save food and reduce expenses to that to accumulate more funds for the state.
sentences.chinese: 他们省吃俭用，为了给国家多积累资金。

sentences.english: We need to pinch pennies these days.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在需要省吃俭用了。
